text: Miklós Bálint (born 4 December 1957) is a Hungarian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Hungary Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Budapest
title: Miklós Bálint
